name: Hate Free Heroes: Tactics
description:
Hate Free Heroes Tactics is a community based online game and adventure. Help your city reduce aggro levels by building your agency, defeating aggromites and researching new ways of keeping city aggro levels at a minimum. Play from any web browser, PC, tablet or phone.

Aggromites/Aggromite (definition) [ag-roh-myht] [noun]: A mischievous entity that influence a person's aggression levels through the "dream world" or altered reality.

Build your agency, upgrade your offices with equipment, hire agents to increase your resources, make medical advancements, research new advancements, complete missions, go out on the field and defeat aggromites, engage in cyber defense pvp, upgrade your character gear and so much more. Launch the game from any web browser, no downloads needed.

*YOU WILL RECEIVE 1 ACCESS KEY TO BE ABLE TO REGISTER AND PLAY: https://www.tactics.hatefreeheroes.com

  • Strategy Based Building Game, Turn Based, Character Building RPG
  • Fully browser based. Play from any system, phone, tablet or PC
  • Community chat, agency and global rankings
  • Upgrade your agency base with equipment to earn resources
  • Engage in Cyber Defense PVP and build your PVP Rank
  • Explore the city and defeat aggromites
  • Level up your character (Level Max +120)
  • Buy gear and upgrade your character equipment
  • Complete research and medical advancements
  • Earn in game achievements to earn meta crystals
  • Complete Quests and Missions
  • Join or create your own agency branch and earn experience
  • Compete for ranking and climb the ranks
  • Countless hours of gameplay
  • and so much more...
